column4: Total No. of Cases for investigation including Pending Cases from previous year (Col.4)
column6: No. of Cases in which investigation Refused (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which investigation Completed ChargeFoundFalse / Mistakeof Fact or Law Etc. (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which investigation Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col.8)
column9: No. of Cases in which investigation Completed - Charge Sheet Submitted (Col.9)
column10: No. of Cases in which investigation Completed - Total (Col.10) = {(Col.7) + (Col.8)+ (Col.9)}
column11: No. of Cases Pending investigation at the end of the year (Col.11)
column13: Percentage of Pendency to All India Total (Col.13)
